conclusion: A particle is moving in a straight line along the x-axis, starting at x = 5 m at t = 0.
The v-t graph shows velocity is 2 m/s from t = 0 to t = 4 s, and -1 m/s from t = 4 s to t = 8 s.
Displacement from t = 0 to t = 2 s is 4 m.
Displacement from t = 2 s to t = 4 s is 4 m.
Displacement from t = 4 s to t = 6 s is -2 m.
Displacement from t = 6 s to t = 8 s is -2 m.
Total displacement from t = 0 to t = 8 s is 4 m.
Final position of the particle is 9 m.
